tool_description: Rest API's for current World Climatic changes and updates latest.
name: World Climate Changes
title: World Climate Changes

api_list.name: Get Individual Live Updated Climate News
api_list.description: Get Live updated climate news from individual resources and media.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-climate-changes.p.rapidapi.com/news/ndtv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-changes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-climate-changes.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-changes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Live Updated Climatic News
api_list.description: This Rest EndPoint will return back the current latest live updated climatic news around the world happening from top leading media and news.
api_list.code:

url = "https://world-climate-changes.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
